verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; on stringed instruments. A Psalm, a Song. God <S%H430><s%> be merciful <S%H2603><s%> unto us <S%H1288><s%>, and bless us <S%H6440><s%>, And cause his face to shine <S%H215><s%> upon us <S%H5542><s%>; [[Selah
That thy way <S%H1870><s%> may be known <S%H3045><s%> upon earth <S%H776><s%>, Thy salvation <S%H3444><s%> among all nations <S%H1471><s%>.
Let the peoples <S%H5971><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> thee <S%H430><s%>, O God; Let all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> praise thee <S%H3034><s%>.

Oh let the nations <S%H3816><s%> be glad <S%H8055><s%> and sing for joy <S%H7442><s%>; For thou wilt judge <S%H8199><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> with equity <S%H4334><s%>, And govern <S%H5148><s%> the nations <S%H5971><s%> upon earth <S%H776><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
Let the peoples <S%H5971><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> thee <S%H430><s%>, O God; Let all the peoples <S%H5971><s%> praise thee <S%H3034><s%>.
The earth <S%H776><s%> hath yielded <S%H5414><s%> its increase <S%H2981><s%>: God <S%H430><s%>, even our own God <S%H430><s%>, will bless us <S%H1288><s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> will bless <S%H1288><s%> us <S%H657><s%>; And all the ends of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall fear him <S%H3372><s%>.
